resources.string: Command the heads. Make critical decisions regarding the station.
Manage the civilian and supply departments. Manage job transfers.
Make sure your officers apply Space Law and not act as THE LAW.
Manage the Engineers and Life Support Specialists.
Oversee the entire research department. Make sure everything is done according to standards.
Remind people about their sensors. Manage the medical bay. Be a one-man-department.
Be the word of god without it\'s power.
Ensure fair and just punishments or sentences are handed out. You are Space Law.
Guard any Central Command VIPs. This includes the heads, visitors, representatives, ambassadors, etc.
Oversee the brig. Make sure records are up-to-date. Manage the prisoners within, Manage Armoury Inventory.
Apply Space Law. Assure the safety of crew members and civilians.
Pilot the armed security pod, hunt down space fugitives.
Investigate crime scenes officers can\'t or won\'t solve. Harass the department to arrest the criminals you investigated.
Investigate internal issues. Mostly security-related issues. Harass Central Command.
Fix up all visitors and officers of the Brig. Bring suicidals to the Psychologist.
Start up the engine(s), repair hull breaches and fix electronics.
Make and maintain Station vehicles. Build a space pod.
Set up atmospherics. Extinguish fires. Cry about people opening fire locks. Turn the borgs into swiss cheese when they get uppity.
Treat the crew from damage attained by incompetence.
Stalk the sensor console, stabilize patients and bring them in Medical.
Create important and required medicine for the doctors and cryogenics.
Discover genetic powers. Oversee cloning operations.
Cure epidemics. discover antigens. Wash yourself constantly.
Handle insane patients. Do check-ups. Straight-jacket the clown.
Research new technology, create explosives, experiment with teleportation or discover ancient treasures.
Create cyborgs and mechs for the crew to enjoy.
Breed new types of slimes with unique abilities.
Oversee Cargo and mining. Make sure everything is up to standards and running smoothly. Remove the bodies from Disposals and yell for security.
Fill the cargo paperwork. Order essentials. Deny the weapons crate the clown asked.
Mine materials and smelt them for Research and Engineering.
Wash the station from civilian blood and dirt.
Prepare, cook and serve meals for the station to enjoy.
Mix and serve drinks. Shoot people with the shotgun.
Grow useful plants for the Chef and station.
Give the station haircuts when they need it the least.
Visit the station. Meet the Head of Personnel to get a job, or go greytiding.
Honk!
Be the hero the station needs against Cultists and Vampires. Praise the Emprah.
Fill the bookcases with books, argue with the Chaplain.
Follow your laws to the letter. Be called rogue 24/7.
Follow your lawset. Assist the station.
Be someone\'s constant companion. Act as a translator.
Follow the commands of your host. Battle your summoner\'s enemies
A god that has been reincarnated into a corgi.
Watch antags kill people and flicker lights spookily.
Observe the round and squeak. Actually act like a mouse.
Turn the station into a gigantic spider web.
Turn the crew into your snack.
Serve your new master.
Complete your objectives. Die an honorable death or escape on the shuttle.
Create paranoia and fear. Turn into anyone and everyone.
Get that fukken disk. Destroy the station with the Nuclear Bomb.
Grow. Spread. Repopulate.
Complete your objectives for the Wizard Order.
Serve Nar\'sie, the dark god from the shadowy depths of space.
Thrive in the shadows and turn the crew into your personal maids. Just avoid the light.
Complete your objectives. Drink blood.
Complete your objectives for the Shoal. Follow the Inviolate.
Survive. Climb into people\'s ears
Drain life force from crew members. Achieve spookiness.
Expand, overtake the station, get nuked.
Be a statue, look smashing. Murder everyone.
Capture crew. Modify.
Respond to the emergency. Protect the crew.
Eliminate the threat to the station by any means.
Complete your objectives, that may include either protecting the crew, or killing them.
Station lacks HONKs! Provide the station with HONKS!
Save the the station and the day!
